permissions.title: Profiles
permissions.description: Get access to create, configure and customize the brands and selling locations of the company.

permissions.title: Teams
permissions.description: Allows you to add individuals to your staff, manage the company and sales channel configurations.

permissions.title: Sales Channels
permissions.description: Allows to add and manage new and existing sales channels

permissions.title: Products
permissions.description: Allows you to create and configure one or more products belonging to any brand or category.

permissions.title: Orders
permissions.description: Get access to the history of all the orders placed by your customers using your application.

permissions.title: Extensions
permissions.description: Extend your application to next level

permissions.title: Developers
permissions.description: Get access to platform APIs and SDKs to create systems and develop e-commerce applications.

permissions.title: Settings
permissions.description: Allows you to configure and customize features across multiple touchpoints in the application.

permissions.title: Audit Trail
permissions.description: Get access to the activity logs that highlight the modifications made by users of the Platform Panel.

permissions.title: Marketplaces
permissions.description: Allows you to manage your online marketplaces; AJIO, Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra and much more.

permissions.title: Other Sellers
permissions.description: Get access to monitor the stores and companies reselling your products through your inventory.

permissions.title: Billings
permissions.description: View billing statistics

permissions.title: Payments
permissions.description: Manage payments and plans

permissions.title: Customer
permissions.description: Allows you to view, channelize and manage all the customer data received in your application.

permissions.title: Analytics
permissions.description: Get real-time insights of a product lifecycle with an option to download the graphs and data.

permissions.title: Settings
permissions.description: Allows you to configure and customize features across multiple touchpoints in the application.

permissions.title: Marketing
permissions.description: Allows you to create collections, coupons, rewards, and much more for marketing and promotions.

permissions.title: Communication
permissions.description: Create communication templates and campaigns for consumer interactions through email and SMS.

permissions.title: Customer Support
permissions.description: Allows you to manage the help desk for storing and processing the customer service requests.

permissions.title: Point Of Sale
permissions.description: Point of sale(POS) for retail transaction in store.

permissions.title: Orders
permissions.description: View the orders received in the sales channel and check the users who withdrew from checkout.

permissions.title: Appearance
permissions.description: Allow to view and manage the themes and navigation in your application.
